tool_description: Validates temperature and humidity compliance across HVAC zones against configured setpoints and acceptable ranges, identifying zones that are out of specification.

sensor_data.description: Current sensor readings for temperature and humidity

error_messages: Zone configuration mismatch: Number of zone_configs must match sensor_data array length or be half for temp-only validation.
Invalid tolerance values: tolerance_temp must be 0.5-10.0, tolerance_humidity must be 1.0-20.0.
Zone config not found: One or more zone configuration identifiers are invalid.
Sensor data out of range: Sensor readings contain invalid values (temp: -50 to 150Â°F, humidity: 0-100%).
usage: Provide zone_configs array, corresponding sensor_data array, and optional tolerance values. Returns compliance status and violations for each zone.

compliant_zones.description: Array of zone IDs that are within specification

violation_zones.description: Array of zone IDs that are out of specification

worst_deviation.description: Largest deviation from setpoint in any zone

violation_summary.description: Summary of violation types: temperature_high, temperature_low, humidity_high, humidity_low
